item.title: Lohengrin
item.description: Have you heard of Lohengrin? It is a German Opera written and composed by Richard Wagner in 1850. I happen to think that German Opera is more entertaining than Italian …

item.title: Battle In The Middle Ages
item.description:
There were three type of battles in Europe in the Middle Ages:

  1. Raids
  2. Sieges
  3. Field-Battles

There were two types of soldiers in Europe in the Middle Ages:

  1. cavalry
  2. and infantry …
